name: Grilled Shrimp Salad with Mango
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
In a bowl, toss the shrimp with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Grill the shrimp for 2-3 minutes on each side until they are opaque and cooked through.
In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining olive oil, lime juice, and honey to make the dressing.
In a large bowl, combine the mixed greens, diced mango, red onion, and avocado.
Top the salad with the grilled shrimp.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
description: A refreshing and nutritious salad featuring grilled shrimp, juicy mango, creamy avocado, and mixed greens, topped with a zesty lime-honey dressing. Perfect for a light yet satisfying meal.
additional_notes: For added flavor, you can marinate the shrimp for 15 minutes before grilling. This salad is naturally gluten-free.
